name: zentropy
description: A comprehensive Product Management platform with Python FastAPI backend and React frontend

scripts.lint: npm run lint:python && npm run lint:typescript
scripts.format: npm run format:python && npm run format:typescript
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:python && npm run type-check:typescript
scripts.quality: npm run lint && npm run format && npm run type-check && npm run test
scripts.test: python3 -m pytest tests/test_startup.py tests/test_api_integration.py && npm run test:react
scripts.test:pre-commit: python3 -m pytest tests/test_startup.py -v && npm run test:react -- src/client/components/__tests__/ProfileDropdown.test.tsx
scripts.test:full: python3 -m pytest tests/test_startup.py tests/test_api_integration.py && npm run test:react
scripts.quality:pre-commit: npm run lint && npm run format && npm run type-check && npm run test:pre-commit
scripts.quality:full: npm run lint && npm run format && npm run type-check && npm run test:full
scripts.analyze:bundle: echo 'üìä Bundle Size Analysis:' && du -sh src/client/dist/ && echo 'üìÅ Bundle Contents:' && ls -la src/client/dist/ && echo 'üìÅ Assets:' && ls -lah src/client/dist/assets/
scripts.perf:build-analyze: npm run build && npm run analyze:bundle
